The Quranic researcher, that is, the magic of the magic of his words, the Almighty: So he sent Pharaoh in the mediators, and he said: It came: What is almost from magic and their machines, and it was said: He gathered his soldiers, and it is permissible for him to collect the people of his kingdom.He called in the group himself or by the mediation of the call and supported the first by saying the Almighty: He said: I am your Lord, the highest, and on the second in which it is appreciated; That is: He said: Pharaoh says: I am your Lord, etc.With what is in the second of the time, and in some antiquities, he raised in them a fianc√©, so he said that great, and he wanted the curse to prefer himself to everyone.
